imdb.plot outline: Cats never forget and never forgive. After Annie steps on Aiden's tail, the cat vows revenge. Annie's pleas for understanding and forgiveness fall on deaf ears. Every episode, with the persistence and inventiveness of Wile E. Coyote, Aiden concocts a convoluted new scheme to murder his human companion. Shot in Portland, Evil Cat is a low-budget, comedic horror Portlandia, satirizing some of the same targets. Annie reaches out to a cat psychic, a therapy group, and assorted flaky friends and boyfriends, as she attempts to heal her failed relationship with her cat -- before he kills her.
imdb.title: Evil Cat
plot: Cats never forget and never forgive. After Annie steps on Aiden's tail, the cat vows revenge. Annie's pleas for understanding and forgiveness fall on deaf ears. Every episode, with the persistence and inventiveness of Wile E. Coyote, Aiden concocts a convoluted new scheme to murder his human companion. Shot in Portland, _Evil Cat_ (qv) is a low-budget, comedic horror Portlandia, satirizing some of the same targets. Annie reaches out to a cat psychic, a therapy group, and assorted flaky friends and boyfriends, as she attempts to heal her failed relationship with her cat -- before he kills her.::Thomas M. Sipos, Hollywood Investigator
